title: State v. Terrance Lewis – Addendum 1 – Suspect Conviction
content:encoded:
December 7, 2017 / Special guest host Scott Reeder, host of Suspect Convictions Podcast, is joined by the Undisclosed Team as they discuss the Terrance Lewis case.

Today’s addendum is brought to you by our friends at Rocket Mortgage by Quicken Loans and Omaha Steaks.

Rocket Mortgage by Quicken Loans. Apply simply. Understand fully. Mortgage confidently. To get started, go to www.RocketMortgage.com/undisclosed.

For only $49.99 you can get a Family Gift Pack wen you go to www.omahasteaks.com and enter UA in the search bar – That’s 75% off!
